1528080237_1PMuHrGm4GFBBNbvRgr8zvyyRTc3r.body:
The problem with ZeroNet is that there is no sound economic system, and nodes have only two options: distribute content for free or not. 
This may not be a problem for the average website, but imagine sharing a 100 gigabyte Blu-ray movie file. At this point, if the seeder has no interest, the user deletes the file immediately after watching.

> [matso](#comment_3_1H3f2Q8pxbSVy9MuifHryzGQ9i4mmSuRsd): I think some incentive to share would be great, but I would stay away from greedy ICO scams like IPFS' filecoin. Some sort of automatic bitcoin payments for sharing certain files could work.

I don't think all digitally encrypted currency is a hoax, and in fact ZeroNet uses NameCoin as its domain system.

1533076540_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJV.body:
As a person who works in mainland China, I can answer this question. 
Generally speaking, you can't install Telegram or Telegram in China. This is achieved by two types of blocking. 
First, the government asked Apple to remove the Telegram client from the App Store China, while Google Play was blocked in China, and other Android App Stores in mainland China were asked to remove Telegram. 
On the other hand, all of Telegram's server IP is blocked, even if you successfully install the client on your Android phone via the APK file. 
Of course, the web version is also unusable. 
However, as we all know, there are a large number of users in China using VPN, so you can see Chinese in many Telegram groups, especially those related to encrypted digital currency.

1558666037_1BGbyM8MfxFyJ8xwDkApNMexZTGAk.body:
ZeroNet is a purer decentralized project. 
To put it simply, many people in the zeronet community hate decentralized projects that offering encrypted digital currencies.
The use of legal tender transactions in a network environment that is not legally recognized (ZeroNet) is itself a security risk.
So at this stage ZeroNet can only stay away from business.
In fact, you can post product information in ZeroTalk, ZeroMe or any other ZeroSite. But how to pay and how to logistics, you need to solve it yourself.
